description: This file defines a React context-based global state management system for a TV streaming hub application. It manages navigation, search, and selection states across the app, providing context and hooks for other components.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Reducer function handling state updates based on dispatched actions.

methods.name: StoreProvider
methods.description: Component providing global state context for the app.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Hook to access the global store API within components.
